amendment.description: To ensure high-income earners pay a fair share in taxes and to use the revenue to invest in repairing our Nation's bridges, coastal infrastructure, and damage from wildfires.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 700 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 700 proposed by Senator Whitehouse. (consideration: CR S1879; text: CR S1879) To ensure high-income earners pay a fair share in taxes and to use the revenue to invest in repairing our Nation's bridges, coastal infrastructure, and damage from wildfires.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 700 proposed by Senator Whitehouse.
